Package src.cube

Interface RubiksCubeInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RubiksCube, RubiksCube3X3
    public interface RubiksCubeInterface
    Provides basic functionality necessary for rubiksCube of any dimension
    Since:
    JDK 10.0.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  RubiksCubeInterface.NodeInterface
      Provides basic functionality of Node which is the base to build the RubiksCube

    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        int getDimension()
        returns the dimension of Current RubiksCube object
        Returns:
        int

      • setRubiksCube

        void setRubiksCube​(boolean type,
                   java.lang.String colorInput)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        initializes the colors of the Cube based on type and colorInput
        Parameters:
        type - specifies if the input is from user or colorInput(type can be STRING_INPUT or USER_INPUT)
        colorInput - holds all the colors of the RubiksCube to be initialized
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the RubiksCube couldn't be initialized

      • display

        void display​(boolean type)
        displays colors present in the cube based on type
        Parameters:
        type - type is FACE_WISE,NODE_WISE then color would be displayed face wise, node wise respectively

      • getColor

        java.lang.String getColor​(int i,
                          int j,
                          int k,
                          int subIndex)
        returns the color of given index of 3D cube in String format
        Parameters:
        i - represents index i out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        j - represents index j out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        k - represents index k out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        subIndex - represents the index within the Node
        Returns:
        String

      • getColors

        java.lang.String[] getColors​(int i,
                             int j,
                             int k)
        returns all the colors of given index of 3D cube in String[] format
        Parameters:
        i - represents index i out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        j - represents index j out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        k - represents index k out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube
        Returns:
        String[]

                            int j,

        j - represents index j out of (i,j,k) in 3D cube

      • rotate

        java.lang.String rotate​(int i,
                        boolean direction)
        returns the rotate operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        i - i represents the layer of the cube to be rotated
        direction - for direction R_CLK,R_ANTICLK rotation of ith layer of cube happens in clkwise,anticlk direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • horizontal

        java.lang.String horizontal​(int j,
                            boolean direction)
        returns the horizontal operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        j - j represents the layer of the cube to be moved horizontally
        direction - for direction H_RIGHT,H_LEFT horizontal move of jth layer of cube happens in horizontal right,horizontal left direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • vertical

        java.lang.String vertical​(int k,
                          boolean direction)
        returns the vertical operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        k - k represents the layer of the cube to be moved vertically
        direction - for direction V_UP,V_DOWN vertical move of kth layer of cube happens in vertical up,vertical down direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • circleHorizontal

        java.lang.String circleHorizontal​(boolean direction)
        returns the circleHorizontal operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        direction - for direction H_RIGHT,H_RIGHT entire cube moves towards right,left direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • circleVertical

        java.lang.String circleVertical​(boolean direction)
        returns the circleHorizontal operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        direction - for direction V_UP,V_DOWN the entire cube moves up,down direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • circleRotate

        java.lang.String circleRotate​(boolean direction)
        returns the circleRotate operation performed in String format
        Parameters:
        direction - for direction R_CLK,R_ANTICLK entire cube moves in clk,anticlk direction respectively
        Returns:
        String
